# Form Elements ## Input

## Textarea
## Checkbox The checkbox input ID needs to match the label `for=""` attribute to be clickable.
## Circle Checkbox Apply `clickable` to `circle-checkbox` if the checkbox is enabled.
### Radios The radio input ID needs to match the label `for=""` attribute to be clickable.
## Checkbox Pills Use when modifying UI. The checked element's background is filled with the color specified, while the others are left in a muted state.
## Radio Pills Use when modifying UI. The checked element's background is filled with the color specified, while the others are left in a muted state.
